pullRequest.title: Fix error in the 'Tuple Match' BBE src file
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose
Avoid Error in the Tuple Match BBE
Approach

Remove '[float, boolean] in the b4

Samples

Provide high-level details about the samples related to this feature.

Remarks

List any other known issues, related PRs, TODO items, or any other notes related to the PR.

Check List

 Ballerina By Examples

beforeCommit.message: Removed '[float, boolean]' in the b4, which lead to an ambiguous type error
